text: Ana hu'neanki'na Nagra fra'maki havega mani'ne'na, Israeline Juda vahetera ra kampi mago tanafa'ma hu'za masesaza havegna hu'na mani'nesnuge'za, maka vahe'mo'za tanafa hu'za masegahaze. Ana nehu'na Jerusalemi kumapima mani'naza Israeli vahetera kukone krifumo zamazeriankna hu'na kama vanoma hanafina manigahue.
